reasoning: The test requires the Active Directory Authentication provider to be installed and enabled as a precondition before checking for its login form. The code existing in the codebase does not mean the provider was configured/enabled on the test site - this is an incomplete test setup issue, not an application bug.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows standard DNN login form with username/password fields only. The test expected AD authentication tabs but the AD provider was never installed/enabled on this site - a configuration prerequisite that the test failed to establish before attempting to verify the feature.
scenario_id: DNNPro_ActiveDirectoryAuthentication::Manual AD Login::Verify AD Login Form on Login Page
